summary: A collection of development and testing utilities for medical imaging projects, offering command‑line tools and helper functions to load BIDS‑formatted datasets, apply preprocessing and augmentation, compute class and size distributions, filter segmentation results, generate visual analyses (e.g., clustering, parameter histograms, PCA/t‑SNE), and support reproducibility and contrast assessment.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to efficiently explore, preprocess, augment, evaluate, and visualize medical imaging data, thereby accelerating the development and validation of AI models for spinal cord and lesion segmentation.
